tasks.label: Agents: Run All
tasks.command: echo Starting Host, Presentation, and Summary agents...

tasks.label: Agents: Kill Ports
tasks.command: pids="$(lsof -tiTCP:8000 -sTCP:LISTEN; lsof -tiTCP:8001 -sTCP:LISTEN; lsof -tiTCP:8002 -sTCP:LISTEN)"; if [ -n "$pids" ]; then echo Killing: $pids; kill -9 $pids; else echo 'No agent ports listening'; fi

tasks.label: Agents: Post HTML to Host
tasks.command:
python3 - <<'PY'
import json,sys,urllib.request,os
path=os.path.expanduser('${input:htmlPath}')
with open(path,'r',encoding='utf-8') as f:
    html=f.read()
req=urllib.request.Request('http://localhost:8000/save-latest-html', data=json.dumps({'html': html}).encode('utf-8'), headers={'Content-Type':'application/json'})
with urllib.request.urlopen(req) as resp:
    print(resp.read().decode())
PY

inputs.description: Prompt to send to Host agent
inputs.default: Make a 3-slide presentation about quantum computing. No PDF. Do not summarize.

inputs.description: Path to an HTML file to POST to /save-latest-html
